com.ltsllc.miranda.servlet.event

Class NewEventServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.ltsllc.miranda.servlet.event.NewEventServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class NewEventServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Handler for new events

    When an HTTP POST/PUT or DELETE to a topic occurs, this servlet is invoked. It looks for a header, HEADER_SESSION_ID that contains the session ID for the user. The user must be the owner of the topic or an admin to create new events.

    The topic name is obtained from the URL

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public java.lang.String getTopicName(java.lang.String url,
                                     java.lang.String base)
        Return the topic this event pertains to,
        Parameters:
        url - The URL the event is being published to.
        base - The base URL used to publish the even.
        Returns:
        The name of the topic the event is being published to.
